text: Barry Diamond (born November 14, 1951) is an American comedian. He was born in the Bronx, New York City. He released Fighter Pilot, on IRS Records in 1983. He is also a stand up comedian. He has also acted in some films and television sitcoms. ==References== ==Other websites== *IMDB *Official website Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:American stand-up comedians Category:Comedians from New York City
title: Barry Diamond
